Production.Desc: You can improve musical strings with magic. Success depends on Enchant ability.

Production.Desc: Create a Holy Mana Gem. Success depends on Enchant ability. Requires 100 Mana.

Production.ToolMissmatchMsg: Tool is incorrect.
